author: craigmcc
msg: Eliminate use of "pushd" and "popd" in the implementation of the "debug"
option, because it is not supported on all shells.

msg: Catch and log exceptions thrown by session.expire() in the manager's

author: remm
msg: - Forgot to backport some code from Slide.
- Now, the protocol name is not hardcoded when parsing a destination header,
so it fixes problems when using https. The parsing code is also more robust.
